reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is very knowledgeable, and her lectures are engaging. However, her grading can be tough.

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: The material is challenging, and Dr. Johnson's explanations can be a bit unclear at times.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is passionate about history and makes every class interesting. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's lectures are difficult to follow, and the exams are extremely hard.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Wilson is a great professor, but she assigns a lot of reading and essays.

reviews.subject: Computer Science 101
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is excellent at explaining complex concepts in an easy-to-understand way.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's lectures are informative, but she can be a bit monotone.

reviews.subject: Physics II
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is a solid professor, but the course material is very challenging.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Anderson's classes are thought-provoking and she genuinely cares about her students.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Thomas knows his stuff, but his teaching style can be dry and uninspiring.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Jackson brings art to life with her lectures, but the workload is heavy.

reviews.subject: Biology 101
reviews.review: Dr. White is an amazing professor. His enthusiasm makes the subject enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Dr. Harris's classes are difficult, and she tends to go off on tangents.

reviews.subject: Macroeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Clark is very knowledgeable, but his exams are tough.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis's classes are engaging and she encourages critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Chemistry 101
reviews.review: Dr. Walker is a decent professor, but the course material is hard to grasp.

reviews.subject: Psychology of Learning
reviews.review: Dr. Hall is an excellent professor who makes learning fun and interactive.

reviews.subject: Ethics
reviews.review: Dr. Allen is a great lecturer, but the topics can be quite abstract.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Dr. Young inspires creativity and provides constructive feedback on all assignments.

reviews.subject: Linear Algebra
reviews.review: Dr. King is knowledgeable, but his lectures can be hard to follow.
